publicationstmt.publisher: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-12-12 23:59:06 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: Undetermined, Code for undetermined script script.

change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: S. Stanley Alderfer Arbitration Files
did.abstract: Files of the arbitrator Stanley S. Alderfer. Over four hundred decisions are included, many of which are multi-grievance cases.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Arranged chronologically by the year of the decision. Unless otherwise noted, the file contains only the award.
"A total of about 400 plus decisions are involved. Quite a number are multi-grievance cases, so about 500 grievance decisions are included."-- Stanley S. Alderfer

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: S. Stanley Alderfer Arbitration Files #5576. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
